page.title: 01A Day in the life of Jenny
page.content: My dad wakes me at 7. I get up , put my {radio} on and listen , while I get dressed and washed.Before I go down I make my bed.For {breakfast} I have cornflakes,toast and a cup of tea or orange juice. I help my Mum fill the dish washer.My brother and sister go to catch the school bus.My Dad goes to work in his car.I take my {pony} to the field.My Mum goes to work in her car.She is a {teacher} in a high school.I walk to school.The police man or the lollipop lady see me across the road.In the play ground I meet and chat to my friends. At nine the bell goes for registration. Next we go into the Hall to sing hymns and say prayers.During the morning we do Maths and English.Once a month we go to Church for Holy Communion.Many of us take part by reading lessons .
